sentences.sentence: When I was a little girl, there was this mean boy who called me fatso all the time.
sentences.translation: 我还是小女孩的时候，有个很坏的小男孩老是叫我胖子。

sentences.sentence: Fatso leaned over to whisper in her ear.
sentences.translation: 胖子欠身对她耳语几句。

sentences.sentence: CHORUS: Shut up Clarke, you bitter fatso.
sentences.translation: 和唱团：闭嘴，克拉克，你个死胖子。
